txt.en: 'Well met again, [placeholder]. We have need of assistance for our merchant ships. We have been attacked by freebooters several times in our ongoing efforts to get food and supplies to help support Halrax in the Shield Isles. The Khâlbina is ready to set sail later today for a run to the Isles. Would you go aboard and protect her during this journey? Halrax is counting on those supplies.'
You have successfully defeated the Corsairs! Return with the Umbari scout to the mission giver with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
You have been tasked with protecting the merchant ship Khâlbina on its trip to Halrax in the Shield Isles.
'Well that is quite the tale. I am so glad you were there to take on those Corsairs and ensure the crew's safety. Thank you for your valiant deeds.'
'Your objective is clear, [placeholder], protect the Khâlbina at all cost. The hopes of the Khâlbina and her crew rest upon your able shoulders.'
Complete Mission: Protecting the Sea Lanes
Your mission is to protect the merchant ship Khâlbina on its trip to Jax Phanâl.\n\nSpeak to Malthak to travel.
